name: lychee-cdk-example
description: This Example uses the CDK to spin up an EC2, install Docker, run Lychee in Container and use ALB to serve the site via HTTPS

scripts.deploy-stack: cdk deploy --parameters certificateArn='YOUR CERTIFICATE ARN HERE' --parameters keyname='ADD KEYNAME HERE' --parameters ecrarn='096573865771.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/cdk-hnb659fds-container-assets-096573865771-eu-central-1' --parameters imageDigest='sha256:e3fe72d0703faaed59a2ebf35830211c95b183ef83a3f9da886c4dc79507cc8d'
